item.title: Anthropic taps former Microsoft India MD to lead Bengaluru expansion
item.description: Irina Ghose joins Anthropic as India managing director after 24 years at Microsoft.

item.title: Silicon Valley’s messiest breakup is definitely headed to court
item.description: OpenAI and Microsoft tried to dodge a courtroom showdown with Elon Musk, but a federal judge on Thursday rejected their requests to dismiss the case.

item.title: AI journalism startup Symbolic.ai signs deal with Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp
item.description: The startup claims its AI platform can help optimize editorial processes and research.

item.title: The AI lab revolving door spins ever faster
item.description: AI labs just can't get their employees to stay put. Yesterday’s big AI news was the abrupt and seemingly acrimonious departure of three top executives...

item.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing
item.description: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.
